K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-4: 'phrags pa dkon mchog gsum la gus pas phyag 'tshal lo //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-5: 'di skad bdag gis thos pa'i dus gcig na /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-6: bcom ldan 'das mnyan yod rgyal byed tshal mgon med zas sbyin gyi kun dga' ra ba na bzhugs so //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-7: de nas de'i tshe lha'i bu zla ba lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis bzung nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-8: de nas lha'i bu zla bas bcom ldan 'das rjes su dran pa yid la byas te /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-9: de'i dus su tshigs su bcad pa 'di gsol to //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-10: sangs rgyas dpa' bo de la 'dud //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-11: thams cad myur du grol bar gyis //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-12: bdag 'di'i kha ru bcug pas na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-13: bdag ni khyed la skyabs su 'gro /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-14: de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis lha'i bu zla ba'i ched du /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-15: lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la tshigs su bcad pa bka' stsal pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-16: sangs rgyas 'jig rten la brtse bas //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-17: dgra bcom bzhin gshegs pa la //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-18: zla ba skyabs su song bas na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-19: sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla ba thongs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441a-20: de nas lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin gyis /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-0: lha'i bu zla @441b ba grol bar byas nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-1: sngar gyi gzugs bzhin du gang su zhig gis lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyis drung du song zhing song nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-2: sems mi dga' zhing yi mug pas ba spu langs par gyur pas phyogs gcig tu 'dug go /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-3: phyogs gcig tu 'dug nas yang lha ma yin gyi dbang po sgra gcan 'dzin la /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-4: lha ma yin gyi dbang po thags bzang ris kyis tshigs su bcad pa smras pa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-5: ci phyir yid ni skrag par gyur //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-6: sgra gcan 'dzin gyis zla ba thongs //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-7: gzugs kyi rnam 'gyur kun tu ngan //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-10: sangs rgyas tshigs bcad thos nas ni //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-11: zla ba bdag gis ma btang na //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-12: mgo bo tshal pa bdun 'gas shing //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-13: 'tsho ba la ni bde ba med //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-14: zla ba'i mdo rdzogs so;; ;;pandi ta chen po a'a nanda shr'i'i zhal snga nas /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-15: mang du thos pa'i lo ts'a ba sh'a kya'i dge slong nyi ma rgyal mtshan dpal bzang pos skad gnyis smra ba rnams kyi gdan sa /
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-16: gtsug lag khang chen po dpal thar pa gling du bsgyur cing zhus te gtan la phab pa'o //
K06acip-k_lha_sa-034-030:441b-17: sa'i steng du nyi ma dang /
